Package main

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameLoop
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Wednesday, April 21, 2016
    Class Description:

    GameLoop is a base class that plays the motion and dynamics of every object in game.
    Also responsible for deciding active elements in game.
    Loop runs at 60FPS (under ideal resource allocation).
    Main
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
    Class Description:

    Main class where resources are defined and base objects are created.
    Also contains methods for generating various stage elements.
    RelCoordinates
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
    Class Description:

    Used to calculation relative position of a point.
    Calculates the location with 224 pixel height has base.
    SpriteHandler
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Wednesday, April 21, 2016
    Class Description:

    Class defining Data Sets for the Sprites in game.
    Used to retrieve/remove and perform other operations such as logic execution with Sprites.
